events.name: 24 Hour Entrepreneurathon: Where Hackathon Meets Designathon
events.about:
Are YOU Creative? 

Design Thinkers, Entrepreneurs, and Tech Minds... Compete!

24 Hr Entrepreneurathon: Where Hackathon Meets Designathon

 

Want to Compete?

Participate as….

An Entrepreneur!
A Techie!
A Creative Mind!
A Design Thinker!

Mobile Apps. Game Apps. Crowdsourcing Tools. Algorithms. Web Platforms... Create Innovative Prototype Solutions  to Challenges In Health, Education, Energy, etc.

Do you have the tech skills and want to put your skills to good use to help launch an idea or support a venture?

Do you have an idea or a venture but do not have the technology know-how and want to get connected to techies?

Do you have an idea or a venture but do not know how technology can support your venture? Want to find out? Think about all that you could be missing out on! 

Creativity Workshop

events.name: 24 Hour Entrepreneurathon: Where Hackathon Meets Designathon
events.about:
Are YOU Creative?

Designers, Developers, Entrepreneurs, and Creative Minds... Compete!

24 Hr Entrepreneurathon: Where Hackathon Meets Designathon

Want to compete?

Participate as: An Entrepreneur! A Developer! A Designer! A Creative Mind!

Mobile Apps. Game Apps. Crowdsourcing Tools. Algorithms. Web Platforms... Create Innovative Prototype Solutions to Challenges In Health, Education, Energy, etc.

Bringing together groups of collaborators - the techies, the entrepreneurs, the design thinkers, the creative minds, the do-gooders, and the problem-solvers from across disciplines to rapidly prototype solutions during an intensive weekend of round-the-clock work!

With sips of coffee and a desire to CREATE and to make difference in the world, these groups of collaborators from diverse backgrounds and talents will compete and create innovative solutions through mobile apps, game apps, or any other prototype solution of their choice.

Whether its a fun new development or making the world a better place through the use of technology, creating innovative solutions to pressing problems in communities, this 22hr entrepreneurathon will be a chance to win cash prizes, public recognition, create connections with other thinking caps, and work in a team to INNOVATE. 

Judges and Prizes

A panel of judges - from entrepreneurs to technologists to design thinkers to content strategy experts to creative entrepreneurial minds, these expert judges will announce the final winners and present the prizes...

Sign Up & Get Tickets ! Spots Fill up Quickly! 

Do you have the tech skills and want to put your skills to good use to launch an idea? Do you have an idea and want to enter a competition + get connected to others?

Do you have an idea or a venture but do not have the technology know-how and want to get connected to techies?

Do you have an idea or a venture but are not sure how technology can support your venture? Want to find out? Think about all that you could be missing out on! 

Do you enjoy getting creative or do you have a design eye and want to see what you can make happen and create with others?
